[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/dialog.html#attributes)

el-upload/name.description:
key name for uploaded file., default: 'file'.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/with-credentials.description:
whether cookies are sent., default: false.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/show-file-list.description:
whether to show the uploaded file list., default: true.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/drag.description:
whether to activate drag and drop mode., default: false.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/accept.description:
accepted [file types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-accept), will not work when `thumbnail-mode === true`.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/on-preview.description:
hook function when clicking the uploaded files.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/on-remove.description:
hook function when files are removed.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/on-success.type: (response: any, uploadFile: UploadFile, uploadFiles: UploadFiles) => void

el-upload/on-error.type: (error: Error, uploadFile: UploadFile, uploadFiles: UploadFiles) => void
el-upload/on-error.description:
hook function when some errors occurs.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/on-progress.type: (evt: UploadProgressEvent, uploadFile: UploadFile, uploadFiles: UploadFiles) => void
el-upload/on-progress.description:
hook function when some progress occurs.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/on-change.description:
hook function when select file or upload file success or upload file fail.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/on-exceed.description:
hook function when limit is exceeded.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/before-upload.description:
hook function before uploading with the file to be uploaded as its parameter. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, uploading will be aborted.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/before-remove.description:
hook function before removing a file with the file and file list as its parameters. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, removing will be aborted.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/auto-upload.description:
whether to auto upload file., default: true.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/http-request.description:
override default xhr behavior, allowing you to implement your own upload-file's request.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)

el-upload/disabled.description:
whether to disable upload., default: false.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/upload.html#attributes)
